en:
譬例说
(Pì lì shuō)

Pi said cases

Translations of 譬例说
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

譬
    Pi, Analogy, Give an example, Metaphor, Give an example of
说
    said, say, to say, says, said that
例
    cases, Example, Examples, cases of, embodiment
ja:
譬例说
(Pì lì shuō)

Piが言っ例
(Pi ga irrei)

Translations of 譬例说
[ 简体中文 -> 日本語 ]

譬
    Piが, PIは
说
    言っ, 言った, と述べた, と述べ, 言い
例
    例, 場合, ケース, のケース, 事例
